name: War For Nothing
description:
Start with your bare hands and climb your way to the top through hordes of enemies, but what are you actually figting for?

In first stage it might look like the game is really hard but actually you don't need to walk into enemy to kill them, your fist have a pretty long range

Also I'm aware of bug with the ammo counter but I have no idea what's causing this so sometimes the ammo counter might not work properly

Version 1.0a:
- Fixed critical bug with boss room;
- Fixed ciritcal bug in Main Menu screen;

Credits:

THANKS FOR PLAYING :D
